scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets && cd ..\frontEnd && ng build --watch --aot --output-path ..\backEnd\dist\app && cd ..\backEnd
scripts.build-server: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run tslint && npm run copy-static-assets
scripts.watch: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node,NG" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node" "cd ..\frontEnd && ng build --watch --aot --output-path ..\backEnd\dist\app && cd ..\backEnd"
scripts.debug: npm run build && npm run watch-debug
scripts.watch-debug: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node,NG" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug" "cd ..\frontEnd && ng build --watch --output-path ..\backEnd\dist\app && cd ..\backEnd"
scripts.watch-debug-aot: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node,NG" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold,blue.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug" "cd ..\frontEnd && ng build --watch --aot --output-path ..\backEnd\dist\app && cd ..\backEnd"
scripts.watch-debug-server: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run serve-debug"
